channel.title: Need help Thru skype please
channel.description:
I'm trying to make my client to where i can send it to a few of my friends so we can play it. I have a source and a client. I made a no-ip and a port foward. I add my no ip to my client and convert it to a .rar and send it to them yet when they have it they cant connect to server? Btw its a insidiax base i believe.
I just need someone to screen share with and to walk me threw it. I read & watched at all the tutorials I could find, I just need individual help. Anyone? Please?

item.title: Need help Thru skype please
item.dc:creator: @duhstract duhstract
item.description:
@duhstract wrote:

Can one of you just take the 15 minutes to help me over skype please?
I just about bet it’s something simple and easy. But, I’m new and just learning. Need help.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help Thru skype please
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:9, topic:437746”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=540447.msg3958391#msg3958391 date=1332997516]

how do i find my external ip?
i set my no-ip in it but that didnt work…

I HIGHLY don’t suggest setting that as your IP.

Reason being?

No-Ip is there for a reason. If someone was to decompile his source, they would have his real IP.
[/quote]

Anyone can reverse IP lookup and find their IP. There’s no “real” way to hide it.[/quote]
Thats is true.
People can put one lock on a house or 2 locks on a house, which one would you feel safer with?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help Thru skype please
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:7, topic:437746”][quote author=whackatre link=topic=540447.msg3958384#msg3958384 date=1332996663]

how do i find my external ip?
i set my no-ip in it but that didnt work…

I HIGHLY don’t suggest setting that as your IP.

Reason being?
[/quote]
No-Ip is there for a reason. If someone was to decompile his source, they would have his real IP.[/quote]

Anyone can reverse IP lookup and find their IP. There’s no “real” way to hide it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help Thru skype please
item.dc:creator: @Demon6994 Demon6994
item.description:
@Demon6994 wrote:

Firewalls are amazing. ;D I use my external IP. I don’t give a [color=orange]F*CK[/color]! XD
It’s something I could honestly care less about. All the no-ip does is mask your IP… Wooo. They still have the no-ip.
But then again, my network has always been beast. So yeah. XD I’m not worried about SHEEEET. XD

Read full topic

item.title: Need help Thru skype please
item.dc:creator: @andykent andykent
item.description:
@andykent wrote:

for you u would use 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 or localhost…

for your freind you would use your external ip or your no-ip you can change this in the client
